androidx.room

Class DatabaseConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.room.DatabaseConfiguration

  • public class DatabaseConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration class for a RoomDatabase.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean allowMainThreadQueries
      Whether Room should throw an exception for queries run on the main thread.
      java.util.List<RoomDatabase.Callback> callbacks 
      Context context
      The context to use while connecting to the database.
      RoomDatabase.JournalMode journalMode
      The journal mode for this database.
      RoomDatabase.MigrationContainer migrationContainer
      Collection of available migrations.
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the database file or null if it is an in-memory database.
      boolean requireMigration
      If true, Room should crash if a migration is missing.
      SupportSQLiteOpenHelper.Factory sqliteOpenHelperFactory
      The factory to use to access the database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseConfiguration

        public DatabaseConfiguration(@NonNull
                             Context context,
                             @Nullable
                             java.lang.String name,
                             @NonNull
                             SupportSQLiteOpenHelper.Factory sqliteOpenHelperFactory,
                             @NonNull
                             RoomDatabase.MigrationContainer migrationContainer,
                             @Nullable
                             java.util.List<RoomDatabase.Callback> callbacks,
                             boolean allowMainThreadQueries,
                             RoomDatabase.JournalMode journalMode,
                             boolean requireMigration,
                             @Nullable
                             java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> migrationNotRequiredFrom)
        Creates a database configuration with the given values.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        name - Name of the database, can be null if it is in memory.
        sqliteOpenHelperFactory - The open helper factory to use.
        migrationContainer - The migration container for migrations.
        callbacks - The list of callbacks for database events.
        allowMainThreadQueries - Whether to allow main thread reads/writes or not.
        journalMode - The journal mode. This has to be either TRUNCATE or WRITE_AHEAD_LOGGING.
        requireMigration - True if Room should require a valid migration if version changes, instead of recreating the tables.
        migrationNotRequiredFrom - The collection of schema versions from which migrations aren't required.

    • Method Detail

      • isMigrationRequiredFrom

        public boolean isMigrationRequiredFrom(int version)
        Returns whether a migration is required from the specified version.
        Parameters:
        version - The schema version.
        Returns:
        True if a valid migration is required, false otherwise.

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
